trans-unit.target: TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON2_00000_KYUSEI_000_000<tab>So, the first ten floors posed little obstacle to our intrepid friend. Or should I say, the Warrior of Light?
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON2_00000_KYUSEI_000_001<tab>After all, this is what Eorzeans call such a hero, is that not so? A title befitting the one who triumphed over the Black Wolf of Garlemald.
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON2_00000_RASHO_000_002<tab>I had no idea Western affairs were within your purview. Just how far does your reach extend?
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON2_00000_RASHO_000_003<tab>Hmph. You've too many secrets for my liking, but very well. Have it your way.
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON2_00000_KYUSEI_000_004<tab>And have it my way I shall. For this is merely the beginning.

TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON2_00000_KYUSEI_000_010<tab>The challenger has conquered the twentieth floor, and it is only a matter of time before <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> arrives to confront you. May I suggest that─
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON2_00000_KYUSEI_000_011<tab>Yes, quite. In that case, I shall leave you to attend to your duties, as I return to mine. Fare thee well.
